LanguageData.Apparel_GDISoldierHelmet.label: GDI soldier helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_GDISoldierHelmet.description: This helmet has an integrated Tiberium filter, might also repell some bullets if you're lucky.
LanguageData.Apparel_GDISoldierSuit.label: GDI soldier suit
LanguageData.Apparel_GDISoldierSuit.description: This suit is optimized to resist most attacks.
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIOfficerHelmet.label: GDI officer hat
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIOfficerHelmet.description: A shique cap, perfect for every GDI officer!
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIOfficerSuit.label: GDI officer suit
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIOfficerSuit.description: A nice looking suit, perfect for a GDI Officer.
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIEngineerMask.label: GDI Engineer Mask
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIEngineerMask.description: This is the mask of a true engineer. Improves work skills!
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIEngineerSuit.label: GDI Engineer suit
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIEngineerSuit.description: This suit is optimized for any type of work. Improves work abilities.
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIZoneHelmet_TBP.label: zone helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIZoneHelmet_TBP.description: A part of the GDI Zone Trooper armor.
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIZoneSuit_TBP.label: zone suit
LanguageData.Apparel_GDIZoneSuit_TBP.description: A GDI Zone Trooper suit, perfect against Tiberium.
